title: Test
subtitle: Subtitle
citation: Ott, Albert. (p. 3) “AKAN GOLD WEIGHTS.” Transactions of the Historical Society of Ghana, vol. 9, 1968, pp. 17–42.
quote: Gold weights represented the means of determining quantities of gold in Akan society where gold dust was the normal currency. The value of gold to be used in a money transaction was assesed by weight.
